00038    : inputPrefix_(other.inputPrefix_),
00039      outputPrefix_(other.outputPrefix_),

00046    /* 
00047    * Destructor.   
00048    */
00049    FileMaster::~FileMaster() 
00050    {
00051       if (paramFilePtr_) {
00052          paramFilePtr_->close();
00053          delete paramFilePtr_;
00054       }
00055       if (commandFilePtr_) {
00056          commandFilePtr_->close();
00057          delete commandFilePtr_;
00058       }
00059    }

00061    /*
00062    * Set root prefix for all path names.
00063    */
00064    void FileMaster::setRootPrefix(const std::string& rootPrefix)
00065    {  rootPrefix_ = rootPrefix; }
00066 
00067    /*
00068    * Set a directory Id prefix.
00069    */
00070    void FileMaster::setDirectoryId(int rank)
00071    {
00072       std::stringstream sMyId;
00073       sMyId << rank;
00074       directoryIdPrefix_ = sMyId.str();
00075       directoryIdPrefix_ += "/";
00076       hasDirectoryId_ = true;
00077    }
00078 
00079    /*
00080    * Set paramFile() to return std::cin even if a directory id has been set.
00081    */
00082    void FileMaster::setParamFileStdIn()
00083    {  isSetParamFileStdIn_ = true; }

00103    /* 
00104    * Read parameters from file.
00105    */
00106    void FileMaster::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00107    {
00108       readBegin(in, "FileMaster");
00109       read<std::string>(in, "commandFileName",  commandFileName_);
00110       read<std::string>(in, "inputPrefix",  inputPrefix_);
00111       read<std::string>(in, "outputPrefix", outputPrefix_);
00112       readEnd(in);
00113    }
00114 
00115    /*
00116    * Get the default parameter stream.
00117    */
00118    std::istream& FileMaster::paramFile()
00119    {
00120 
00121       if ((!hasDirectoryId_) || isSetParamFileStdIn_) { 
00122 
00123          return std::cin;
00124 
00125       } else { 
00126 
00127          if (!paramFilePtr_) { 
00128 
00129             // Construct filename "n/param" for processor n
00130             std::string filename(rootPrefix_);
00131             if (hasDirectoryId_) {
00132                filename += directoryIdPrefix_;
00133             }
00134             filename += "param";
00135       
00136             // Open parameter input file
00137             std::ifstream* filePtr = new std::ifstream();
00138             filePtr->open(filename.c_str());
00139             if (filePtr->fail()) {
00140                std::string message = "Error opening parameter file. Filename: ";
00141                message += filename;
00142                UTIL_THROW(message.c_str());
00143             }
00144             paramFilePtr_ = filePtr;
00145 
00146          }
00147 
00148          return *paramFilePtr_;
00149       }
00150    }
00151 
00152    /*
00153    * Get the command input stream by reference.
00154    */
00155    std::istream& FileMaster::commandFile()
00156    {
00157 
00158       if (commandFileName_ == "paramfile") {
00159 
00160          return paramFile();
00161 
00162       } else { 
00163 
00164          if (!commandFilePtr_) { 
00165 
00166             // Construct filename "n/param" for processor n
00167             std::string filename(rootPrefix_);
00168             if (hasDirectoryId_) {
00169                filename += directoryIdPrefix_;
00170             }
00171             filename += commandFileName_;
00172       
00173             // Open parameter input file
00174             std::ifstream* filePtr = new std::ifstream();
00175             filePtr->open(filename.c_str());
00176             if (filePtr->fail()) {
00177                std::string message;
00178                message = "Error opening command file. Filename: ";
00179                message += filename;
00180                UTIL_THROW(message.c_str());
00181             }
00182             commandFilePtr_ = filePtr;
00183 
00184          }
00185 
00186          return *commandFilePtr_;
00187       }
00188    }

00190    /*
00191    * Open and return an input file named inputPrefix + name
00192    */
00193    void
00194    FileMaster::openInputFile(const std::string& name, std::ifstream& in) const
00195    {
00196       // Construct filename = inputPrefix_ + name
00197       std::string filename(rootPrefix_);
00198       if (hasDirectoryId_) {
00199          filename = directoryIdPrefix_;
00200       }
00201       filename += inputPrefix_;
00202       filename += name;
00203 
00204       in.open(filename.c_str());
00205 
00206       // Check for error opening file
00207       if (in.fail()) {
00208          std::string message = "Error opening input file. Filename: ";
00209          message += filename;
00210          UTIL_THROW(message.c_str());
00211       }
00212 
00213    }
00214 
00215    /*
00216    * Open and return an output file named outputPrefix + name
00217    */
00218    void
00219    FileMaster::openOutputFile(const std::string& name, std::ofstream& out) 
00220    const
00221    {
00222       // Construct filename = outputPrefix_ + name
00223       std::string filename(rootPrefix_);
00224       if (hasDirectoryId_) {
00225          filename = directoryIdPrefix_;
00226       }
00227       filename += outputPrefix_;
00228       filename += name;
00229 
00230       out.open(filename.c_str());
00231 
00232       // Check for error opening file
00233       if (out.fail()) {
00234          std::string message = "Error opening output file. Filename: ";
00235          message += filename;
00236          UTIL_THROW(message.c_str());
00237       }
00238 
00239    }

00241    /*
00242    * Open an input restart parameter file.
00243    */
00244    void FileMaster::openParamIFile(const std::string& name, const char* ext,
00245                                    std::ifstream& in) const
00246    {
00247       // Construct filename 
00248       std::string filename(rootPrefix_);
00249       if (hasDirectoryId_ && !isSetParamFileStdIn_) {
00250          filename = directoryIdPrefix_;
00251       }
00252       filename += name;
00253       filename += ext;
00254 
00255       in.open(filename.c_str());
00256       if (in.fail()) {
00257          std::string message = "Error opening input file. Filename: ";
00258          message += filename;
00259          UTIL_THROW(message.c_str());
00260       }
00261    }

00264    * Open a restart parameter file for writing.
00265    */
00266    void FileMaster::openParamOFile(const std::string& name, const char* ext,
00267                                    std::ofstream& out) const
00268    {
00269       // Construct filename = outputPrefix_ + name
00270       std::string filename(rootPrefix_);
00271       if (hasDirectoryId_ && !isSetParamFileStdIn_) {
00272          filename = directoryIdPrefix_;
00273       }
00274       filename += name;
00275       filename += ext;
00276 
00277       out.open(filename.c_str());
00278       if (out.fail()) {
00279          std::string message = "Error opening output file. Filename: ";
00280          message += filename;
00281          UTIL_THROW(message.c_str());
00282       }
00283    }

00330    /*
00331    * Will paramFile() return std::cin ?
00332    */ 
00333    bool FileMaster::isParamFileStdIn() const
00334    {  return ((!hasDirectoryId_) || isSetParamFileStdIn_); }
